Actions.Name: Archive or Unarchive a group
Actions.Description: Archive a group. Make SharePoint and Teams read-only for this group.

Actions.Name: Approve or Reject a requested group
Actions.Description: Will send an approval back to GroupMgr for the requested group.

Actions.Name: When a new group is created
Actions.Description: This will trigger when a new group is created.

Actions.Name: When a group is removed
Actions.Description: This will trigger when a group is removed.

Actions.Name: When a new group is requested. (Approval flow)
Actions.Description: This will trigger when a new group is requested within GroupMgr (Only groups with this approval flow).

Actions.Name: When a group is updated
Actions.Description: This will trigger when a group is updated.
